attributes.review: I was really looking forward on opening this app, however after a week I just happen to always get logged out.However during the one week all this app was spewing fake news.As well as not being updated on what is lately happening with such events as the black lives matter movement and pride month.I would honest to god would have wanted to rate less than a star.
attributes.title: Not recommend

attributes.review:
this is the worst app that has ever been created. after opening this app, my screen turned red and demonic chanting came out of my speakers. blood began pouring from my phone and i was electrocuted from the sheer awful quality of this app. i believe the app has cursed me, as the only words i am able to speak are the entire script to the bee movie. the app is also impossible to delete. every 15 seconds it changes my lock screen to a different picture of Mr.Donald with the body of Chihuahua. a terrifying sight. every hour it blasts the theme song to the tv show sitcom â€˜friendsâ€™ sung by someone who clearly does not know the words or even the premise of the show. i think it may be trump himself singing this but i cannot be sure, either way it will not stop playing for 45 minutes once it starts. the app itself is just a picture of an american flag with the caption â€œiâ€™m in a love triangle with a bald eagle and a crate of fireworksâ€ i urge you to never ever download this app and to never ever vote for racist, misogynistic, homophobic, narcissistic people such as Donald Trump.

dear Donald,
